headline: Negative trend emerging in fears
key_insights: Frustrations trending up 117% over 7 days (strong momentum)
Alert: Overall sentiment has significantly increased (z=2.11)
sentiment_commentary:
• Frustrations dominate with 123 quotes despite falling from yesterday's peak - 96 strong-intensity quotes show people are still venting hard.
• At 58.1, frustration levels remain well above the typical range but down significantly from yesterday's 109.5.
• Optimism bounced back notably from yesterday's deep low, while fears stayed consistently quiet.
methodology: See METHODOLOGY.md. Scores use z-score normalization with empirically-derived intensity weights from analytics_config.yaml. Alerts at |z| >= threshold (configurable, default 2.0 for p < 0.05).
